CustomField.formula: CASE(( LeadSource ), 'Web', IMAGE('/resource/web', 'Web',25,25), 'Phone Inquiry', IMAGE('/resource/phone', 'Phone Inquiry',25,25), 'Partner Referral', IMAGE('/resource/community', 'Partner Referral',25,25), 'Purchased List', IMAGE('/resource/purchasedList', 'Purchased List',25,25), 'Salesforce Essentials 2017', IMAGE('/resource/Cloud', 'Salesforce',25,25), 'Not defined')
CustomField.label: Source
